Sentencas: To evaluate the reliability of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks during operation, the stress field in the stack must be known.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: During operation the stress field will depend on time as creep processes relax stresses.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: The creep of reduced Ni-YSZ anode support at operating conditions has been studied previously.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: In this work a newly discovered creep phenomenon taking place during the reduction is reported.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: This relaxes stresses at a much higher rate (similar to x10(4)) than creep during operation.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: The phenomenon was studied both in three-point bending and uniaxial tension.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: Differences between the two measurements could be explained by newly observed stress promoted reduction.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: Finally, samples exposed to a small tensile stress (similar to 0.004 MPa) were observed to expand during reduction, which is in contradiction to previous literature.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: These observations suggest that release of internal residual stresses between the NiO and the YSZ phases occurs during reduction.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: The accelerated creep should practically eliminate any residual stress in the anode support in an SOFC stack, as has previously been indirectly observed.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction

Sentencas: This phenomenon has to be taken into account both in the production of stacks and in the simulation of the stress field in a stack based on anode supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Accelerated creep in solid oxide fuel cell anode supports during reduction
